Message:
Several years passed
in the blink of an eye.

the Duke smiled as
he’s always done,
and said to me...

“Thank you as always.
I’m glad you’re here
for me, Iris.”

I must’ve heard those
words countless times.

But for some reason,
hearing them again
suddenly made me realize.

...This is the place
I can call home.

And this hopelessly
warm-hearted man is
the person I can serve
for as long as I live.

From this day forward,
no matter what kind of
hardships we may face,
I shall remain by your side.

that is exactly
what I was born to do.
